label: 地頭
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: military steward. The Kamakura shogunate originally placed them on estates confiscated from the defeated Taira, but eventually they were placed on many more estates. They were responsible for keeping order and making sure the proprietor received rents, but their primary loyalty was to the shogunate.
